SEARCH
Package com.game.core.shooting

Class ShootingManager

java.lang.Object
com.game.core.shooting.ShootingManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
Updatable
public class ShootingManager extends Object implements Updatable
Manages the shooting behavior of a player in the game, including bullet creation, cooldowns, reloading logic, and shooting strategies. This class implements Updatable to allow regular updates tied to game events or timers.

  • Constructor Details

    • ShootingManager

      public ShootingManager(Player player, BulletType bulletType, ShootingStrategy shootingStrategy, SceneConfig.BulletConfig bulletConfig, int maxBulletsCount, float bulletsReloadDelay, float bulletsCooldown, boolean isInfinityBulletsMode)
      Creates a new ShootingManager instance with the specified parameters.
      Parameters:
      player - The player entity associated with this shooting manager.
      bulletType - The type of bullets being shot.
      shootingStrategy - The shooting strategy used for firing bullets.
      bulletConfig - Configuration settings for bullets.
      maxBulletsCount - The maximum number of bullets that can be held.
      bulletsReloadDelay - The delay between reloading bullets.
      bulletsCooldown - The cooldown time between consecutive bullet firings.
      isInfinityBulletsMode - Specifies if infinite bullets mode is enabled.

  • Method Details

    • toggleShooting

      public void toggleShooting(boolean state)
      Toggles the shooting state for the player. When enabled, this will initiate shooting based on the shooting strategy and game configuration.
      Parameters:
      state - true to enable shooting, false to disable.

    • isShooting

      public boolean isShooting()

    • update

      public void update(double deltaTime)
      Updates the state of the shooting manager, including handling reloading timers and bullet queues.
      Specified by:
      update in interface Updatable
      Parameters:
      deltaTime - The time difference since the last update, used for timing calculations.

      public void setShootingStrategy(ShootingStrategy shootingStrategy)
      Sets a new shooting strategy for the player. This defines how bullets are fired.
      Parameters:
      shootingStrategy - The new ShootingStrategy to use.
